00209 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00210 l4_task_cap_equal_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap_a,

00212 
00218 enum L4_task_ops
00219 {
00220   L4_TASK_MAP_OP         = 0UL,    
00221   L4_TASK_UNMAP_OP       = 1UL,    
00222   L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP    = 2UL,    
00223   L4_TASK_ADD_KU_MEM_OP  = 3UL,    
00224   L4_TASK_LDT_SET_X86_OP = 0x11UL, 
00225   L4_TASK_VM_OPS         = 0x20UL, 
00226 };
00227 
00228 
00229 /* IMPLEMENTATION -----------------------------------------------------------*/
00230 
00231 #include <l4/sys/ipc.h>
00232 
00233 
00234 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00235 l4_task_map_u(l4_cap_idx_t dst_task, l4_cap_idx_t src_task,
00236               l4_fpage_t const snd_fpage, unsigned long snd_base, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00237 {
00238   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00239   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_MAP_OP;
00240   v->mr[3] = l4_map_obj_control(0,0);
00241   v->mr[4] = l4_obj_fpage(src_task, 0, L4_FPAGE_RWX).raw;
00242   v->mr[1] = snd_base;
00243   v->mr[2] = snd_fpage.raw;
00244   return l4_ipc_call(dst_task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 3, 1, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00245 }
00246 
00247 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00248 l4_task_unmap_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const fpage,
00249                 unsigned long map_mask, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00250 {
00251   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00252   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_UNMAP_OP;
00253   v->mr[1] = map_mask;
00254   v->mr[2] = fpage.raw;
00255   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 3, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00256 }
00257 
00258 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00259 l4_task_unmap_batch_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const *fpages,
00260                       unsigned num_fpages, unsigned long map_mask,
00261                       l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00262 {
00263   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00264   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_UNMAP_OP;
00265   v->mr[1] = map_mask;
00266   __builtin_memcpy(&v->mr[2], fpages, num_fpages * sizeof(l4_fpage_t));
00267   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2 + num_fpages, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00268 }
00269 
00270 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00271 l4_task_cap_valid_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00272 {
00273   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00274   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP;
00275   v->mr[1] = cap & ~1UL;
00276   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00277 }
00278 
00279 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00280 l4_task_cap_has_child_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00281 {
00282   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00283   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP;
00284   v->mr[1] = cap | 1UL;
00285   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00286 }
00287 
00288 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00289 l4_task_cap_equal_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap_a,
00290                     l4_cap_idx_t cap_b, l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00291 {
00292   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00293   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_CAP_INFO_OP;
00294   v->mr[1] = cap_a;
00295   v->mr[2] = cap_b;
00296   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 3, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00297 }
00298 
00299 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00300 l4_task_add_ku_mem_u(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const ku_mem,
00301                      l4_utcb_t *u) L4_NOTHROW
00302 {
00303   l4_msg_regs_t *v = l4_utcb_mr_u(u);
00304   v->mr[0] = L4_TASK_ADD_KU_MEM_OP;
00305   v->mr[1] = ku_mem.raw;
00306   return l4_ipc_call(task, u, l4_msgtag(L4_PROTO_TASK, 2, 0, 0), L4_IPC_NEVER);
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 
00311 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00312 l4_task_map(l4_cap_idx_t dst_task, l4_cap_idx_t src_task,
00313             l4_fpage_t const snd_fpage, unsigned long snd_base) L4_NOTHROW
00314 {
00315   return l4_task_map_u(dst_task, src_task, snd_fpage, snd_base, l4_utcb());
00316 }
00317 
00318 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00319 l4_task_unmap(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const fpage,
00320               unsigned long map_mask) L4_NOTHROW
00321 {
00322   return l4_task_unmap_u(task, fpage, map_mask, l4_utcb());
00323 }
00324 
00325 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00326 l4_task_unmap_batch(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const *fpages,
00327                     unsigned num_fpages, unsigned long map_mask) L4_NOTHROW
00328 {
00329   return l4_task_unmap_batch_u(task, fpages, num_fpages, map_mask,
00330                                l4_utcb());
00331 }
00332 
00333 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00334 l4_task_cap_valid(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap) L4_NOTHROW
00335 {
00336   return l4_task_cap_valid_u(task, cap, l4_utcb());
00337 }
00338 
00339 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00340 l4_task_cap_has_child(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap) L4_NOTHROW
00341 {
00342   return l4_task_cap_has_child_u(task, cap, l4_utcb());
00343 }
00344 
00345 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00346 l4_task_cap_equal(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_cap_idx_t cap_a,
00347                   l4_cap_idx_t cap_b) L4_NOTHROW
00348 {
00349   return l4_task_cap_equal_u(task, cap_a, cap_b, l4_utcb());
00350 }
00351 
00352 L4_INLINE l4_msgtag_t
00353 l4_task_add_ku_mem(l4_cap_idx_t task, l4_fpage_t const ku_mem) L4_NOTHROW
00354 {
00355   return l4_task_add_ku_mem_u(task, ku_mem, l4_utcb());
00356 }
